article_title: New Gov. Sam Brownback letter begs for money, attacks media, ignores reality

article_metadata.news-keywords: sam, brownback, letter, funds, tax, cuts, schools, roads, budget, opinion
article_metadata.description: How’s this for chutzpah from Kansas Gov. Sam Brownback? Just a day after announcing more devastating budget cuts, he sent out a letter attacking the liberal media and begging donors to send in “your most generous contribution” to help pay off his 2014 campaign debt.
article_metadata.title: New Gov. Sam Brownback letter begs for money, attacks media, ignores reality | The Kansas City Star
